name: Request Trade
service.name: trader-app-web
inline_script: step('Go to http://proxy-ext.$NAMESPACE.svc.cluster.local:$PORT/', async () => {await page.goto('http://proxy-ext.$NAMESPACE.svc.cluster.local:$PORT/'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Request Trade Make a trade' }).click(); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Submit' }).click(); await page.waitForTimeout(5000);});
